name: GRAMYA VIKAS AARTI
briefDescription: Formed the organization only in view of social services with dedication to poorer sections of the locality in various ways and since last 17 years, we have served the locality successfully with satisfactory outcomes in sector of youth, women, adolescents, children and old age person accordingly.We have implemented the so many dignitary projects under youth skill development, women empowerment, life skill education for adolescents, old age care, vocational training, environment preservation, common education, family planning operation etc. in instant, we are engaged under LIC of India in Micro Insurance Scheme and scheme is ongoing rapidly.
